feed.title: RFC for BIP: Derivation scheme for P2WPKH-nested-in-P2SH based accounts

entry.title: RFC for BIP: Derivation scheme for P2WPKH-nested-in-P2SH based accounts
entry.summary: Daniel Weigl, a member of the Bitcoin developer community, has prepared a proposal for a Bitcoin Improvement Proposal (BIP) related to a BIP44-compliant wallet. The proposal can be found on GitHub and is open for comments from other members of the community. Daniel has requested a number for the proposal if there are no objections.
